requirements.summary: Remove caffeine.ai attribution from footer in Layout.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Made with caffeine.ai' (or any variation such as 'Powered by caffeine.ai') is no longer visible anywhere on the page footer.
No other footer content is unintentionally removed.
The layout remains visually intact with no broken spacing or empty footer artifacts.

file_operations.description: Remove the 'Made with caffeine.ai' attribution text from the footer section. Retain any other footer content (e.g., copyright line) while ensuring the footer layout remains visually intact with proper spacing.
